duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage multiple construction projects and coordinate design professionals, contractors, and contracts.
Review project documents and ensure completeness for the respective phase of design and construction.
Manage the quality of the project and ensure successful completion as it relates to schedule and budget.
Familiarize and develop a strategy to coordinate the requirements/needs of all interested parties.
Analyze requested changes and manage the change process.
Coordinate communications between contractor, client, site personnel, and design professionals.
Prepare punch list(s) and monitor completion by the contractor(s).
Conduct on-site project meetings and improve project communications and reduce interferences.

education_certification.credential: Four year college degree in engineering, architecture or related field is preferred.
Minimum of 2+ years of performing construction management role.
